enum: Unethical Practices(Such as - subletting, offering/demanding undue favors in cash or in kind to a stakeholder like Assessor, in order to influence the outcome of assessment OR with any other malafide intention affecting the outcome of the training)
Non-Availability of mandatory/required infrastructure/tools and equipment for each job role post inspection
Center was closed at the time of visit
Training not being conducted at the time of visit as per PMKVY guidelines
Intimidating assessor to conduct assessment at a place other than authorized by SMART
Training not being conducted at the time of visit
Non Availability of required infrastructure /tools and equipment for each job role post inspection. However, mandatory equipment is present at the center
Non Availability of SSC Certified Trainers at the Center.(Has trainer been formally nominated for the ToT and the ToT is pending from SSC’s end)
Non Distribution of Induction Kits to the trainees
Non Distribution of Handbook to the trainees
Non Usage of AEBAS for recording Trainees and Trainers attendance
Regular candidates are admitted at the Training Centre

offen.title: Non Compliance Observed
enum: Unethical Practices(Such as - subletting, offering/demanding undue favors in cash or in kind to a stakeholder like Assessor, in order to influence the outcome of assessment OR with any other malafide intention affecting the outcome of the training)
Non-Availability of mandatory/required infrastructure/tools and equipment for each job role post inspection
Center was closed at the time of visit
Training not being conducted at the time of visit as per PMKVY guidelines
Intimidating assessor to conduct assessment at a place other than authorized by SMART
Training not being conducted at the time of visit
Non Availability of required infrastructure /tools and equipment for each job role post inspection. However, mandatory equipment is present at the center
Non Availability of SSC Certified Trainers at the Center.(Has trainer been formally nominated for the ToT and the ToT is pending from SSC’s end)
Non Distribution of Induction Kits to the trainees
Non Distribution of Handbook to the trainees
Non Usage of AEBAS for recording Trainees and Trainers attendance
Regular candidates are admitted at the Training Centre

actionConfig.formula: if (this.dim <=50) {this.abcd = 'Within Center'} else if(this.dim >= 50 && this.dim <= 80) {this.abcd = 'Nearby Center'} else if(this.dim >= 80) {this.abcd = 'Out of Center'} else {' '}

function distance(lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2){if(lat1==undefined || lon1==undefined){return 0;}else{var radlat1=(Math.PI*lat1)/ 180;var radlat2=(Math.PI*lat2)/ 180;var theta=lon1-lon2;var radtheta=(Math.PI*theta)/ 180;var dist=Math.sin(radlat1)*Math.sin(radlat2)+Math.cos(radlat1)*Math.cos(radlat2)*Math.cos(radtheta);if(dist>1){dist=1;} dist=Math.acos(dist);dist=(dist*180)/ Math.PI;dist=Math.round(dist*60*1.1515*1609.344);return dist;}}distance(this.tcld.tclat,this.tcld.tclong,this.l.lonlat[1],this.l.lonlat[0]);
